thread.title: Lawyer Emails Put Visa, MasterCard Settlement at Risk
thread.title_full: Lawyer Emails Put Visa, MasterCard Settlement at Risk

title: Lawyer Emails Put Visa, MasterCard Settlement at Risk
text:
Lawyer Emails Put Visa, MasterCard Settlement at Risk Merchants expected to challenge $6 billion class-action antitrust pact By Robin.Sidel@wsj.com July 27, 2015 3:16 p.m. ET 
The discovery of a trove of emails between two opposing lawyers who are also close friends is threatening to scuttle a $6 billion class-action antitrust settlement between Visa Inc., MasterCard Inc. and millions of merchants. 
Lawyers representing roughly 100 big merchants, including Wal-Mart Stores Inc., Home Depot Inc., and 7-Eleven Inc., are expected on Tuesday to formally notify the card networks that they will seek to unravel the... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
